GSD.product_version: versions from v3.9 to before v5.10.122
GSD.description:
tty: goldfish: Use tty_port_destroy() to destroy port

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit ee6c33b29e624f515202a31bf6ef0437f26a1867, it was introduced in version v3.9 by commit 666b7793d4bfa9f150b5c2007ab48c755ddc53ca. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tty: goldfish: Use tty_port_destroy() to destroy port
